item.description:
Presenter: Dave Forgianni
Title: Semantic MediaWiki+ and Semantic Forms for use in Gym Management

Created a wiki for boxing gym which uses Semantic MediaWiki+ with Semantic Forms. As an example, we have a form for editing a 'person' page, and a barcode scanner that pops the person name into the search box on the wiki when they sign in at the gym using their membership card.



Meetup round table discussion: "Year end review and what excites you about next year"

Group discussion to list and discuss highlights of 2010 for SemWeb. Depending on time - we'll also take a look at what we expect to be exciting in 2011. Feel free to mention your personal SemWeb projects. This will be a loose, informal discussion with no prepared slides.
item.how_to_find_us: 4th floor, Star Conference Room, Stata Center, MIT
item.name: Cambridge Semantic Web December Meetup
